LabelText: Collect details of the suspected phishing email/message (sender, links, attachments)
Analyze email headers for spoofing indicators or malicious routing
Do not click links or open attachments from the phishing message
Report phishing attempt to security/SOC team
Block sender domain, URLs, and file hashes at the email gateway and firewall
Identify users who interacted with the email (clicked links, opened attachments)
Force password resets for affected users and review session tokens
Scan affected devices for malware, credential theft tools, or persistence
Remove the phishing email from all user mailboxes
Document incident impact, users affected, and corrective actions
